title: n1betisscam
author: n1betisscam
content: Hi,I open this topic to provide how N1bet scam people. I made deposit 3500e, i made win to 5600e. I made withdrawl 1000e, they deactivated account, after all my details I provide them all documents, they want Video call verification. They call 13mins Skype call, after 24h they rejected my withdrawls and deposit. They steal all. They dont give me any reason for steal my money.https://ibb.co/tKdJqM2https://ibb.co/gPrD8xThttps://ibb.co/swrPz7Whttps://ibb.co/K0PbLBMhttps://ibb.co/18VVFNqhttps://ibb.co/fk8PqQmhttps://ibb.co/6nVQKf6https://ibb.co/k0S35Mthttps://ibb.co/HD6tWvY

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: Firstly, n1bet casino has no rep in this forum so this thread you should move it to another board as proper place i think someone else can respond on this matter.Move to: Scam AccusationsPreviously there was also the same charge as the n1bet casino with the profile "n1betscam" the exact name you made now so is this you too?n1bet.com - BIG SCAM AND FRAUDThe case is the same as this case, if this is why you are making another deposit at this casino?

They dont give me any reason for steal my money.https://ibb.co/tKdJqM2https://ibb.co/gPrD8xThttps://ibb.co/swrPz7Whttps://ibb.co/K0PbLBMhttps://ibb.co/18VVFNqhttps://ibb.co/fk8PqQmhttps://ibb.co/6nVQKf6https://ibb.co/k0S35Mthttps://ibb.co/HD6tWvYThis is unfortunate and unfair. I checked to see if their presence is registered here but none and they have no representative here to answer for them whatever the case maybe. Members have been advised to do with casinos whose presence are registered here for easy conflict resolution but it seems  as the day  goes more cases of unpopular casinos pop up here waiting for urgent settlement. Another is the issues of evidence. It was stated somewhere in another post by a participant that members should always take a screenshot of their Winnings and also any process that seems fishy displayed by any casino they identify with so as to have records because of the actions and inactions of casinos of lately. The issues of account suspension and Lock down as a result of winning is getting out of hand.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: You post this on gambling board, you can see many casinos and bookmakers sites on gambling board, you can check their official threads and see the best one that you can open an account with. Read their ToS and follow their rules. For casinos, I can recommend you https://livecasino.io not because I put on their signature and avatar but because they are trustworthy.

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Have you previously used their platform or just randomly deposited 3,500 Euros there? That is a huge risk to take.The forum would not be able to help you with the recovery of your money, you can search them up on any other platform where they have a presence and attract attention to your situation.- Jay -

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: I'm not even familiar with the name of the casino itself, so I check the website and it's fairly old,QuoteRegistered On:2018-08-25However, as I have said, haven't heard of it and the template seems familiar to me (although I can't recall). In any case, maybe you can file a dispute at this link: https://www.askgamblers.com/submit-complaint. And then see how it goes for you, note: I'm not in any way or form related to that site, but maybe they can help you out with our case.Best of luck.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Rating on Askgambler and Casinoguru for this casino seems pretty high- https://www.askgamblers.com/online-casinos/reviews/n1bet-casino- https://casino.guru/n1-bet-casino-reviewIt seems you already opened a complaint as advised by Baofeng https://www.askgamblers.com/casino-complaints/n1bet-casino-5600-euro-declined-withdraw.You can also file a complaint against N1bet at casinoguru if you want https://casino.guru/complaints/create....Anyone interested in the case should probably just follow that link. I doubt any of their customer support or representative will respond here.

comments.author: Myleschetty
comments.body: Quote from: n1betisscam on January 05, 2023, 03:14:45 PMNo I dont know. I dont see this topic before. I am first time open account on N1Bet.Understand this no matter how this forum doesn't support scams and shady casinos there's nothing we can do to prevent you scam casinos if you yourself can't do some background check on the casino before you use it, especially a casino that has no announcement thread or promotion on this forum.Since the casino has an excellent reputation on Askgambler, I will encourage you to report the matter to Askgamblers, exactly like the previous user did.

I doubt any of their customer support or representative will respond here.It is good you filled up a complaint immediately so your dispute would be attended to immediately. This you should know to get registered with casinos whose presence are noticed here so as to be in the safe side. It is also advised that you should always do a thorough research on them before getting registered and as well check for reviews about the casinos so you could know people's views about them that will also give you hint on their activities and too their customer care service.

I doubt it.OP is complaining about being scammed by N1BET casino, I believe he wasn't asking of which casino to join, except there's a part of the OP's post I missed, then you can point it to me.@OP, your experience with this N1BET is rather unfortunate, it's my first time of seeing that name here, and worst of it all is that this casino don't have their online presence on this forum, what I can advice you do now is to look for their online community and complain there, that's the only way you can get help, if you can't find their online community anywhere, then maybe report the matter to whatever firm that gave them license to operate, if none, then I am sorry, your money is gone.

After he was scammed, he took the scam up on this forum, not even on scam accusation but on gambling board. There is nothing bad to let him know that there are gambling sites on this forum which are trustworthy. It is better to use the gambling sites on this forum so that his complain can be genuine and we can bring it to the notice of the gambling site representative on this forum. Or do you want him to register on another site that he will be scammed again? comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on January 05, 2023, 06:54:11 PM@OP, your experience with this N1BET is rather unfortunate, it's my first time of seeing that name here, and worst of it all is that this casino don't have their online presence on this forum, what I can advice you do now is to look for their online community and complain there, that's the only way you can get help, if you can't find their online community anywhere, then maybe report the matter to whatever firm that gave them license to operate, if none, then I am sorry, your money is gone. That's a piece of nice advice, and unfortunately, I just found an online community to which this casino belongs, (I.e Askgambler.com) and they have a minimum of 2 days to respond to complaints. So I think if O.P can forward his/her complaint to this forum, there can be positive feedback. Moreover, n1Bit is licensed by "Curacao" to operate, established in 2021 and managed by a company known as DAMA N.VLink to it's page on ask gambler.com https://www.askgamblers.com/online-casinos/reviews/n1bet-casino

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: How did you get to know about this casino or site mate? I mean I haven’t heard of this site or casino. I didn’t even know that this site has existed before you posted here. Nevertheless how could you deposit such a big amount without doing prior research. To be honest no one other than you should be blamed here. I am sure you have deposited your funds there due to some sort of promotions or offer and at last you now are the victim of the scam. Nothing can be done now. You are trapped mate. Now people will just learn from your mistakes and nothing else can be done to be frank.

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: un_rank on January 05, 2023, 03:45:45 PMHave you previously used their platform or just randomly deposited 3,500 Euros there? That is a huge risk to take.The forum would not be able to help you with the recovery of your money, you can search them up on any other platform where they have a presence and attract attention to your situation.- Jay -I wonder the very same thing, making a deposit of 3500 Euros is a big deal for the majority of gamblers out there, and if someone were to do this I would assume they were doing it at a casino which had their complete trust, but it seems this was not the case.Then why deposit so much money at a casino in which you have no former history? Is it the welcome bonus? Because that seems like the only reason which can explain this behavior, and if that is the case then gamblers need to learn to ignore those bonuses as it is simply not worth to try to get them when you have to risk your money and even your personal information in this way.
